kpi.name: hlr_5015a

kpi_info.title: MB max load ratio - TRB
kpi_info.use: This is the maximum load of the message bus during the measurement period. KPI used for Ethernet based message bus. This KPI is applicable to the HLR NEs.
kpi_info.use_experience:
Must be used the RAW views since NetAct defined aggregated rules are AVG for TIME + NETWORK.
This KPI is similar to msc_5016b. New KPI ID reference (HLR NE).
This new KPI ID reference is to to be used starting from M15.1 report sets.

RECOMMENDED SUMMARY LEVELS: (PLMN - HLR - UNIT)
KPI CLASS: Resource
MEASUREMENT(S): Message bus load observation report (120/78H)

kpi.kpi_alias: MB max load ratio - TRB HLR
